## cilium bpf fs show

Show bpf filesystem mount details

```
cilium bpf fs show [flags]
```

### Examples

```
cilium bpf fs show
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help            help for show
  -o, --output string   json| jsonpath='{}'
```

      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
